attributes.action: NO MORE TAXES ON TOP OF WHAT WE ALREADY PAY
attributes.additional_details:
From cradle to the grave we are meant to be looked after-what it really means from 'cradle to the grave/and beyond'you are taxed!!!
As a normal taxpayer I suggest no more direct/indirest taxes against the British people.We are taxed enough to pay for whatever colour is in power.
Time to stop tax rises-reduce across the board-and realise the British People have had enough-is the air we breathe next?
